mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.name AS "name", a.specifications AS "specifications", a.model AS "model", a.count AS "count", a.cost AS "cost", a.account_number AS "accountNumber", a.purchaser AS "purchaser", a.purchase_project AS "purchaseProject", a.purchase_project_id AS "purchaseProjectId", a.manufacturer AS "manufacturer", a.in_date AS "inDate", a.acceptance_results AS "acceptanceResults", a.charger AS "charger", a.location AS "location", a.contract_id AS "contractId", a.warehouse_receipt_id AS "warehouseReceiptId", a.devstatus AS "devstatus"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dev_in_warehouse( id, type, name, specifications, model, count, cost, account_number, purchaser, purchase_project, purchase_project_id, manufacturer, in_date, acceptance_results, charger, location, contract_id, warehouse_receipt_id, devstatus ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{specifications}, #{model}, #{count}, #{cost}, #{accountNumber}, #{purchaser}, #{purchaseProject}, #{purchaseProjectId}, #{manufacturer}, #{inDate}, #{acceptanceResults}, #{charger}, #{location}, #{contractId}, #{warehouseReceiptId}, #{devstatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dev_in_warehouse SET type = #{type}, name = #{name}, specifications = #{specifications}, model = #{model}, count = #{count}, cost = #{cost}, account_number = #{accountNumber}, purchaser = #{purchaser}, purchase_project = #{purchaseProject}, purchase_project_id = #{purchaseProjectId}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, in_date = #{inDate}, acceptance_results = #{acceptanceResults}, charger = #{charger}, location = #{location}, contract_id = #{contractId}, warehouse_receipt_id = #{warehouseReceiptId}, devstatus = #{devstatus} WHERE id = #{id}
